name: Rosi Savalas
story: Rosi Savalas was born and raised in the mountains of the Greek peninsula. He grew up learning how to hunt and survive in the wilderness. When the conflict in the region began, he quickly became a key player in the local resistance movement. His fearless leadership and unpredictable tactics have made him a thorn in the side of enemy forces. Despite the danger, Rosi remains fiercely committed to the movement and is determined to see it through to its end, whatever the cost.
